entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
